title: Regression verification checklist updates for HOTEL DUMMY room purge and ghost-room prevention

requirements.summary: Update frontend regression checklist and add a short release-notes checklist template to verify HOTEL DUMMY purge + ghost-room fix did not break key flows.
acceptanceCriteria: Guest Browse Hotels still loads and shows other active hotels correctly.
Hotel Area → Rooms still works for a different (non-dummy) hotel: rooms can be created/updated and displayed.
Admin panel still loads and hotel visibility toggles still work.
HOTEL DUMMY no longer shows any rooms anywhere in the UI after the upgrade cleanup runs.

file_operations.description: Add a targeted manual regression verification section for the HOTEL DUMMY one-time purge and ghost/placeholder room prevention, explicitly covering: Guest Browse Hotels, Hotel Detail room list, Hotel Area → Rooms for a non-dummy hotel, and Admin panel hotel visibility toggles. Keep all new checklist text in English.

Create a short release-notes checklist template for recording the REQ-44 verification results (intended to be copied into PR description or used as release notes), including explicit checkboxes confirming HOTEL DUMMY shows zero rooms and other key flows remain working; keep text in English.
